title: Microsoft uncovers DDoS campaign targeting Minecraft servers
description: A simple technique is capable of bringing down “half the world’s” Minecraft servers, Microsoft says.

title: Google Wallet will soon host your digital driver's license, but only in one state
description: The new Wallet feature makes crossing TSA checkpoints more convenient; assuming, for now, you live in Maryland

title: This devious phishing campaign uses Facebook messages to trick its victims
description: Analysts from Trustwave uncover email-based phishing campaign looking to harvest Facebook user data.

title: Meta just halted a major data centre project to focus on AI
description: Meta has canceled a major data center development, as it refocuses on "supporting AI workloads".

title: This 45 year-old Unix tool is finally getting an upgrade
description: New AWK update was almost half a century in the making.

title: ExpressVPN just proved the security of its software with new audits
description: Cure53 confirmed the leading VPN provider as a safe choice for securing your sensitive data and login details on mobile.

title: Amazon Games to publish the 'most expansive' Tomb Raider game yet
description: Amazon Games has announced that it will work with Crystal Dynamics on the next Tomb Raider following its acquisition by Embracer.

title: The Witcher 3 developer addresses next-gen update issues – and offers some solutions
description: CD Projekt Red has addressed issues with The Witcher 3's next-gen update, including broken mods and frequent crashes.

title: Here's how we all used Zoom in 2022
description: Middle of the week is prime time as Zoom uncovers busiest periods and surprising generational divides

title: The all-new iPad Pro crashes to a record-low price – and arrives before Christmas
description: We've spotted Apple's 2022 iPad Pro on sale for a lowest-ever price of $719.99 – and it'll be delivered in time for Christmas.

title: Samsung's next QD-OLED TVs will fix the two big problems with its first models
description: The Korean manufacturer will introduce a larger range of QD-OLED TVs in 2023 with much improved black levels

title: Microsoft Teams is going fully virtual with HoloLens 2
description: Microsoft HoloLens wants Teams to help build the "industrial metaverse".

title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (December 16)
description: From new superhero adventures to returning drama series, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

title: HTC announces surprise VR headset to take on the Meta Quest Pro
description: HTC is ready to challenge Meta with a new standalone VR headset that will take on the Meta Quest Pro

title: Barbie movie trailer shows life in plastic really is fantastic
description: The first trailer for Margot Robbie's Barbie movie has been released online.

title: Amazon's best standing desk deals
description: Get a great deal on Amazon for a standing desk that will fit your work-from-home, work-from-the-office, or gaming setup

title: Henry Cavill's next project has been revealed – and it's not with Netflix or Marvel
description: Henry Cavill has teamed up with Amazon Studios to develop a Warhammer 40k cinematic universe.

title: GitHub brings free secret scanning to all public repositories
description: Free secret scanning is set to come to all GitHub public repositories, and 2FA will become mandatory for all.

title: Millions of IP cameras around the world are unprotected
description: Research shows nobody seems concerned about where IP cameras come from, or the security measures placed on them.

title: AMD accused of treating consumers as 'guinea pigs' by shipping unfinished RX 7900 GPUs
description: Some tech heads lucky enough to get their hands on the GPU are reporting broken code and strange clock speed variance.

title: Tech giants band together to set up open-source mapping platform
description: Overture Maps Foundation aims to build more reliable maps, but Apple and Google aren’t taking part.

title: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 will swing onto PS5 in late 2023

title: Nvidia RTX 4070 Ti vs AMD RX 7900 XTX battle gets a surprise twist
description: It’s surprising to see the 4070 Ti edge out the flagship AMD GPU, but there’s more to this than meets the eye.

title: Why now could be the best time to upgrade your printing hardware

title: New update turns your Google Nest into a Matter control hub
description: Eight Nest devices, like the WiFi Pro, are now able to control the smart home standard as Google promises more next year.
